title: Dear Riot, Fuck you...
body:
because I was jungler and forgot {{summoner:11}} and the penalty for that shit is too fucking extreme!!!!!!!!!!!!

There was nothing wrong back when you could go smiteless {{champion:19}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:5}} 

In case you missed it in the title, I say again, FUCK YOU!

Love,
Radiant Wukong

replies.body:
It was a fix to prevent midlaners and tops abusing jungle items in competitive play, but honestly it just needs to be reverted.. Let them do it, who really cares?

But you more or less fuck yourself and your team by forgetting smite anyway - cant contest boss objectives, clear disadvantage, ect. Work on that first.
Oh no, Riot changed a game mechanic so a part of it would stop being abused and a defined role could be finally created! And seasons ago on top of that! How horrible!
